description: This file defines a local database handler for a Flutter app using sqflite. It provides methods to initialize, clear, and close the database, managing a single table named 'sample_items'.

classes.name: LocalDb
classes.description: A class managing the local sqflite database connection, creation, and maintenance.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Getter that returns an initialized database instance, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Deletes all records from the 'sample_items' table.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the database connection and resets the database instance.
